thread.title: #74: We can do better ~ Empathieschenker Podcast
thread.title_full: #74: We can do better ~ Empathieschenker Podcast

author: Empathieschenker
title: #74: We can do better ~ Empathieschenker Podcast
text: Laila talks about her conviction that we need to do things better. She is moved by the regeneration of our environment and our being. She wants to inspire people to reflect on what it means to be and what our being is as individuals and as a global community. We are all interdependent and we need to learn to share better. Important aspects of this for her are ownership and belonging. A deep and thought-provoking conversation. And now enjoy listening. She is moved by the regeneration of our environment and our being.
